#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
typedef pair< int , int > pii;
typedef long long LL;
#define fr first
#define se second
#define EPS 1e-8
#define INF 10000*10000*10000LL
stringstream ss;
#define two(x) ( 1LL<<x )
LL mod = 1000000007LL;

/**************************Code****************************/


int main()
{
	int t, n, m;
	scanf( "%d", &t );
	while( t -- )
	{
		scanf( "%d%d", &n, &m );
		LL a = 1, b = 1, c;
		for( int i = 2 ; i <= n ; i ++ )
		{
			a = ( a + b ) % m;
			b = ( a + b ) % m;
		}
		printf( "%d/%d\n", (int)a, (int)b );
	}
	return 0;
}
